Image.Text: Hiyo! I'm Bromomethane! Want to be my friend?
PSYCH! Actually we already met before, back when I used to be a Methane. I underwent Free Radical Substitution to become a Bromomethane. [row] Would you like to know how that works?
Alkanes react with Halogens in the presence of UV light. Free Radical Substution with Alkanes will yield Halogenoalkanes. I reacted with Bromine, so I'm a Bromomethane! [row] Got that?
Halogenoalkane/Bromomethane:Great, I'll be joining your Party then!
Oh, if you had understood I was going to join your party...
...oh ...and here I was super excited to be talking to you.
